name: Simply Southern Bento Box
author: My Hot Southern Mess
ingredients: ⅓ cup shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese
1 ½ tablespoons pimento peppers, drained and chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine Cheddar cheese, cream cheese, 1 1/2 tablespoons mayonnaise, pimento peppers, jalapeno pepper, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, onion powder, salt, and black pepper in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment
Beat at medium speed until thoroughly combined
Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Mash yolks, 2 teaspoons mayonnaise, paprika, and mustard powder together in a bowl
Mix sour cream, apple cider vinegar, garlic, and dill together in a bowl
Place pimento cheese in a small container; surround with crackers
Add 2 deviled egg halves, cucumber salad, and sliced peaches to divided sections of the bento box
